text: Sergiu Cosmin Bar (born 19 March 1980) is a Romanian former footballer who played as a centre back for teams such as UM Timișoara, Metalul Plopeni, Petrolul Ploiești, Victoria Brănești, Săgeata Năvodari and Singen 04, among others. ==Honours== ;UM Timișoara *Divizia C: Winner (1) 1998–99 ;Victoria Brănești *Liga III: Winner (1) 2008–09 *Liga II: Winner (1) 2009–10 ==External links== * * * Sergiu Bar at fupa.net Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Timișoara Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:FC Politehnica Timișoara players Category:CSP UM Timișoara players Category:CSO Plopeni players Category:FC Petrolul Ploiești players Category:FC Victoria Brănești players Category:CSU Voința Sibiu players Category:AFC Săgeata Năvodari players Category:CS Afumați players Category:Romanian expatriate footballers Category:Romanian expatriate sportspeople in Germany Category:Expatriate footballers in Germany
title: Sergiu Bar
